Workflow.Name: SetupWizard>GetUserGraphPermissions
Workflow.Description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and calls https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-licensedetails?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http to return which licenses are assigned to the current user (the user running the Setup Wizard) to the app.

Description.description: This flow is triggered from the Setup Wizard and calls https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/graph/api/user-list-licensedetails?view=graph-rest-1.0&tabs=http to return which licenses are assigned to the current user (the user running the Setup Wizard) to the app.
